alert.note: Alert for Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:46PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Walworth County through 515 PM CDT... At 445 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near New Everets Resort, or 11 miles southwest of Selby, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Everets Resort. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
